  • Processor: i5-9600k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1060 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: i9-10850k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 650 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

  • Additional Notes: Game Should work on all PCs but you will still deal with some lag because of too much physics

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ​2 GB VRAM OpenGL 2.1+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: it's small and humble a pixel art game!

Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7.5, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: it's small and humble a pixel art game!
